price: 80. Celui qui obéit au Messager a obéi à Allah, quant à ceux qui se détournent, Nous ne t’avons pas envoyé pour être leur gardien.
arabic: مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدۡ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: man yuṭiʿi al-rasūla faqad aṭāʿa al-laha waman tawallā famā arsalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan
